main event: A UFO sighting occurred on September 7, 1967, in New York City, observed by 3 or 4 witnesses.
interesting points: The object was described as solid with sharply outlined edges,It disappeared behind a tree,The color of the object was slightly darker than the sky,The total observation time lasted approximately 25 minutes,The observer had previously witnessed UFOs.
witness description: A male observer aged 15, who has seen UFOs before.
